Package zti.filmbase

Class JPAResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • zti.filmbase.JPAResource
  • @Path("/jpa")
public class JPAResource
extends Object
    Represents a resource class for handling JPA-related and JAX-RS operations.

      • getMovies

        @GET
@Path("/movies")
@Produces("text/html")
public String getMovies()
        Retrieves the movies as an HTML representation.
        Returns:
        The HTML representation of the movies.

        public void getMoviesBody()
        Generates the body of the movies HTML representation.

@Path("/watchlist")

      • getRating

@Path("/rating")
@Produces("text/html")
public String getRating()
        Retrieves the rating as an HTML representation.

      • rateMovie

        @POST
@Path("/rateMovie")
@Produces("text/html")
@Consumes("application/json")
public String rateMovie​(jakarta.json.JsonObject rateData)
        Handles the rating of a movie.
        Parameters:
        rateData - The JSON object containing the movie ID and rating.
        Returns:
        The HTML representation of the updated movies page or rating page.

      • addMovieToWatchlist

        @POST
@Path("/addMovieToWatchlist")
@Produces("text/html")
@Consumes("application/json")
public String addMovieToWatchlist​(jakarta.json.JsonObject watchlistData)
        Adds a movie to the user's watchlist.
        Parameters:
        watchlistData - The JSON object containing the movie ID.
        Returns:
        The HTML representation of the updated movies page.

      • deleteMovieFromWatchlist

        @DELETE
@Path("/deleteMovieFromWatchlist")
@Produces("text/html")
@Consumes("application/json")
public String deleteMovieFromWatchlist​(jakarta.json.JsonObject watchlistData)
        Deletes a movie from the user's watchlist.
        Parameters:
        watchlistData - The JSON object containing the movie ID.
        Returns:
        The HTML representation of the updated movies page or watchlist page.

      • logout

        @GET
@Path("/logout")
@Produces("text/html")
public String logout()
        Logs out the user and returns the HTML representation of the updated movies page.
        Returns:
        The HTML representation of the updated movies page.

      • getLoginPage

        @GET
@Path("/login")
@Produces("text/html")
public String getLoginPage()
        Retrieves the login page.
        Returns:
        The HTML representation of the login page.

      • login

        @POST
@Path("/login")
@Consumes("application/json")
@Produces("text/html")
public String login​(jakarta.json.JsonObject loginData)
        Handles user login.
        Parameters:
        loginData - The JSON object containing the login data (username and password).
        Returns:
        The HTML representation of the movies page if login is successful, otherwise the login page.

      • getRegisterPage

        @GET
@Path("/register")
@Produces("text/html")
public String getRegisterPage()
        Retrieves the registration page.
        Returns:
        The HTML representation of the registration page.

      • register

        @POST
@Path("/register")
@Consumes("application/json")
@Produces("text/html")
public String register​(jakarta.json.JsonObject registerData)
        Handles user registration.
        Parameters:
        registerData - The JSON object containing the registration data (username and password).
        Returns:
        The HTML representation of the movies page if registration is successful, otherwise the registration page.
